dmca.title: Copyright Infringements at TMSTORRENTS.com
dmca.body:
nc

-----Original Message-----
From: ayngaran ayngaran [mailto:ayngarandvd@gmail.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, February 15, 2005 5:45 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Copyright Infringements at TMSTORRENTS.com

As you may know by now, there have been suits filed against a number
of significant
BitTorrent operators. We continue this correspondence in the hope that 
we might resolve matters with another operator such that litigation is
unnecessary.

We have recieved information of a tracker hosted on your server, commiting 
copyright infringements. Upon investigation, it has come to light that, 
a significant amount of copyright infringement is occurring as a result 
of the tracker.

The tracker and their website is run under the name: 
TMSTORRENTS.com. The tracker address is:  http://tmstorrents.com:2710/a 
Most of the DVD's they provide on their tracker are releases 
of Ayngaran International. For example the releases: 'Manmathan DVDrip', 
'Chellame DVD image', are obviously copyright material which is held 
by Ayngaran International. You can view the original releases at: 
http://e-sales.ac/ayngaran/ . Our company site is located at
http://www.ayngaran.com.

We have requested that they stop the infringing conducts 
immediately. We also request you to suspend or terminate their server, or to

carry out any measures you take for using your service for copyright
infringements.
It is incumbent on you to prevent the use of your service to distribute
files 
that are unauthorized to be distributed.
